Text.Page: In addition to uncovering these endless conspiracies, we've also got treasures to find. The war effort is depending on us, and the {@LinkCreature:42#210#Dagonite crusaders} are making it difficult. Let us make things difficult for them in turn, <PCNAME>.
We're always happy to reward work well done, and this was well done indeed.
We'll never find those treasures if we have to wade through {@LinkCreature:42#210#Dagonite crusaders} in every room, <PCNAME>.
